name: Colonizer 2
description:
Welcome to Colonizer 2! Here, you colonize planets and moons, as in the name, and terraform them to turn them into livable homes!

Build bases on almost any planet you like. Almost any moon you like. Heck, why not go into interstellar space and build bases on exoplanets? Ha!

Building and terraforming is the name and the aim of the game.

Mobile controls in the settings menu.
